title: Publish current version (build and deploy)

requirements.text: Build and publish (deploy) the current PATIL Construction website version to production, ensuring the deployment completes successfully without build-time errors (TypeScript compile errors, missing imports, missing static assets, or invalid paths).
acceptanceCriteria: A production deployment is completed successfully for the current codebase.
The build completes with no TypeScript compilation errors.
All referenced static assets resolve at runtime (no 404s for /assets/generated/*).
The deployed site loads and renders the main sections (Header, Hero, Services, About, Contact, Footer) without runtime errors.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/immutablePaths (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui).
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (all logic in backend/main.mo); only add backend migrations if an upgrade requires state changes.
nonGoals: No new pages, sections, or content changes beyond what is required to successfully build and publish.
No redesign or visual changes unless needed to resolve build/runtime errors.
No new backend features or persistence changes unless required to fix deployment blockers.
